sentences.en: August is still an awfully long way away.

sentences.cn: 七八月间，石油产品价格下降了0.2％。

sentences.en: Diplomatic relations were frozen until August this year.
sentences.cn: 外交关系直到今年8月才解冻。

sentences.en: He moved to another city last August.
sentences.cn: 去年八月，他搬到另一座城市。

sentences.en: Negotiators from the three countries finalized the agreement in August.
sentences.cn: 8月里三国谈判人员最终敲定了协议。

sentences.en: New consumer credit fell to $3.7 billion in August.
sentences.cn: 8月份新增消费信贷降至37亿美元。

sentences.en: Ominously, car sales slumped in August.
sentences.cn: 8月份的汽车销量暴跌，这可不是个好兆头。

sentences.en: Take cuttings from it in July or August.
sentences.cn: 7月或8月时从它上边剪一些插枝。

sentences.en: That night in August, waiting for the Rolling Stones to come on stage, we felt like rebels.
sentences.cn: 在那个八月的夜晚，在等待滚石乐队登台演出时，我们有种造反的感觉。

sentences.en: The call-up of National Guard and reserve units begun in late August.
sentences.cn: 国民警卫队和预备役的征兵工作8月下旬开始。

sentences.en: The letter was franked in London on August 6.
sentences.cn: 这封信8月6日在伦敦盖过免费邮戳。

sentences.en: The registration form showed his date of birth as August 2, 1979.
sentences.cn: 登记表显示他的出生日期是1979年8月2号。

sentences.en: The world premiere took place in August 1956.

sentences.cn: 大部分是从八月开始，它们开始进行巨大的迁徙，从美国的北部到南部，而到了春天又沿相反方向回来。

sentences.en: They throng the beaches between late June and early August.
sentences.cn: 6月底到8月初，他们群聚在海滩上。

sentences.en: They were married on August 9 in a civil ceremony in Venice.
sentences.cn: 他们于8月9号在威尼斯举行了世俗婚礼。
